title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aapse apne kala ke safar ki ek chhoti si kahani baatna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se khelna bahut pasand tha. Deewaron par, kitabon mein, jahan bhi jagah milti, bas rang bhar deti thi.

Anushka: Maa daantti thi, par dil mein kahin na kahin, unhe bhi pata tha ki yeh sirf shaitani nahi, kuch aur bhi hai.

Anushka: Phir school mein ek painting competition hua. Maine darte darte participate kiya.

Anushka: Aur yakeen maaniye, main jeet gayi! Woh pal... woh mera turning point tha.

Anushka: Us din mujhe samajh aaya, yeh sirf rang nahi hain, yeh meri aawaaz hain. Mera tareeka hai duniya ko dekhne ka.

Anushka: Aaj bhi main seekh rahi hoon, experiment kar rahi hoon. Kabhie acha lagta hai, kabhie frustrated bhi hoti hoon.

Anushka: Par main jaanti hoon, yeh safar kabhi khatam nahi hoga. Aur main chahti hoon ki aap bhi apne passion ko follow karein. Kya pata, aapki kahani bhi kuch aisi hi shuru ho jaaye! Shukriya!
